channel.title: Photo of the Day
channel.description: Photo of the Day - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Whooper Swan
item.description:
In Oulanka National Park, Finland, a whooper swan prepares for takeoff in the morning mist. The swan, whose wings can span up to nine feet, is the national bird of Finland.
在芬兰的欧兰卡国家公园，一只大天鹅在晨雾中准备起飞。这只天鹅的翅膀能长到九英尺，是芬兰的国鸟。
item.author: Peter Essick, Nat Geo Image Collection

item.title: Fiery Incense
item.description:
In Malacca, Malaysia, a man lights large incense sticks outside of a Taoist temple to celebrate the Chinese New Year. Malaysian people with Chinese heritage make up almost a quarter of the country's population.
在马来西亚马六甲，一名男子在道观外点燃大香炉庆祝中国新年。马来西亚有华人血统的人几乎占全国人口的四分之一。
item.author: John Stanmeyer, Nat Geo Image Collection
